TopicTitle: How do you make stock propellers?

Articles.Content: Please help me make stock propellers.

Thread moved to Questions since it is seeking help rather than offering it. 

I can't help you with props because I myself have never seen the appeal.   But someone else will be along presently to help.

With a lot of patience.

You might already have seen some demonstrations on youtube (link to one of several) that will give the basic idea.

There is has been a golden age of propeller craft on kerbalx.com (link) recently.  You can try other people's designs and take them apart to understand how they work.

If I remember correctly, you use the PC version, so you can use the mod collide-o-scope to see exactly when parts are just touching, which is extremely helpful in making bearings.
